entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 8 with temperature rising to 14 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low 8 with temperature rising to 14 by morning. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers or thunderstorms. High 21 except 13 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: Showers or thunderstorms. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 21 except 13 near Lake Erie. Humidex 26. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
